description: The Sawtooth X Mid has all the same updates as the low X, but with added height for improved support and stability. Whether you decide to hike the Ten Lake Basin Trail or trail closer to home, the Sawtooth X Mid is certain to get you through each day and reach every summit on your map.
name: Oboz Sawtooth X Mid - Mens

specs.value: Oiled nubuck, Cordura Fabric mesh, TPU heel counter, 100% RPET Repreve Laces, 100% RPET Repreve Webbing, Micro-injected PU window underlay
Nylon Shank, Heel puck, Rubber-blended adaptive foam
